message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're willing to make a serious offer. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you halfway just yet. I'm willing to come down to $135, but I think that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $135. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $125. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway from my last offer, so I'll come down to $132.50. That's as low as I can go without losing money on the deal. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit short of my target price. I'll try to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $127.50. Can you consider that?

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob! I'll meet you halfway from my last offer, so I'll come down to $131.25. This is my final concession, I'm afraid. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit short of my target price. I'll try to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $126.75. Can you consider that?

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, Bob. I've already made significant concessions, and I'm not sure I'm willing to go any lower. I'll make one final offer: $130. I think this is as low as I can go without losing money on the deal. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'm afraid I'll have to walk away.

I understand your frustration, Alice, but I'm still a bit short of my target price. I'll try to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'll counter with $127. I think this is the best I can do. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to consider buying from John for $150.
